name: UpdateSecurityFilter
description:
Update a specific security filter's configuration.

Use this tool to update the configuration of a specific security filter in Datadog. It returns the updated security filter object when successful.

parameters.name: security_filter_id
parameters.description: The ID of the specific security filter to update.

value_schema.description: The ID of the security filter.

parameters.name: new_security_filter_definition
parameters.description: JSON object defining the new properties of the security filter, including attributes like name, query, version, exclusion_filters, etc.

query.description: Exclusion filter query. Logs that match this query are excluded from the security filter.

exclusion_filters.description: Exclusion filters to exclude some logs from the security filter.

is_enabled.description: Whether the security filter is enabled.

name.description: The name of the security filter.

query.description: The query of the security filter.

version.description: The version of the security filter to update.

attributes.description: The security filters properties to be updated.

type.description: The type of the resource. The value should always be `security_filters`.

value_schema.description: New definition of the security filter.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Datadog API.
